original: Udāna 7.9
Udapānasutta
Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena thūṇaṁ nāma mallānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
analyzed: ▁ekaṃ ▁samay aṃ ▁bhagavā ▁mall esu ▁ cārik aṃ ▁ca r amāno ▁mah atā ▁bhikkhusaṃgh ena ▁saddhiṃ ▁yena ▁t hū ṇ aṃ ▁nāma ▁mall ānaṃ ▁brāhmaṇa gā mo ▁tad avas a ri

original: Assosuṁ kho thūṇeyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā:
analyzed: ▁ ass o su ṃ ▁kho ▁t hū ṇ eyya kā ▁brāhmaṇa ga ha pat ikā

original: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito mallesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ thūṇaṁ anuppatto”ti.
analyzed: ▁samaṇ o ▁ khal u ▁bho ▁gotamo ▁sakyaputt o ▁sak ya kul ā ▁pabbajit o ▁mall esu ▁ cārik aṃ ▁ca r amāno ▁mah atā ▁bhikkhusaṃgh ena ▁saddhiṃ ▁t hū ṇ aṃ ▁anuppatt oti

original: (…) Udapānaṁ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṁ:
analyzed: ▁ud ap ānaṃ ▁tiṇ assa ▁ca ▁bhus assa ▁ca ▁yāva ▁mukh ato ▁pūr esu ṃ

original: “mā te muṇḍakā samaṇakā pānīyaṁ apaṁsū”ti.
analyzed: ▁mā ▁te ▁mu ṇḍ akā ▁samaṇ akā ▁pānīy aṃ ▁ap aṃ sūti

original: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena rukkhamūlaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
“iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṁ āharā”ti.
analyzed: ▁ iṃ gh a ▁me ▁tvaṃ ▁ānanda ▁et amhā ▁ud apā nā ▁pānīy aṃ ▁āhar āti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
“idāni so, bhante, udapāno thūṇeyyakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūrito:
analyzed: ▁idāni ▁so ▁bhante ▁ud apā no ▁t hū ṇ eyya k ehi ▁brāhmaṇa ga ha pati k ehi ▁tiṇ assa ▁ca ▁bhus assa ▁ca ▁yāva ▁mukh ato ▁pūr ito

original: ‘mā te muṇḍakā samaṇakā pānīyaṁ apaṁsū’”ti.
analyzed: ▁mā ▁te ▁mu ṇḍ akā ▁samaṇ akā ▁pānīy aṃ ▁ap aṃ sūti

original: Dutiyampi kho …pe…
tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
“iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṁ āharā”ti.
analyzed: ▁ iṃ gh a ▁me ▁tvaṃ ▁ānanda ▁et amhā ▁ud apā nā ▁pānīy aṃ ▁āhar āti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā pattaṁ gahetvā yena so udapāno tenupasaṅkami.

original: Atha kho so udapāno āyasmante ānande upasaṅkamante sabbaṁ taṁ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato
analyzed: ▁atha ▁kho ▁so ▁ud apā no ▁āyasmant e ▁ānand e ▁ upasaṃkam ante ▁sabbaṃ ▁taṃ ▁tiṇ añca ▁bhus añca ▁mukh ato

original: ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: ▁ ova m itvā ▁a cch assa ▁udak assa ▁anā vi l assa ▁vippa sann assa ▁yāva ▁mukh ato ▁pūr ito ▁vi ssa nd anto ▁maññ e ▁aṭṭhāsi

original: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:
“acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
Ayañhi so udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṁ taṁ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe ṭhito”ti.
analyzed: ▁ayañhi ▁so ▁ud apā no ▁ma yi ▁ upasaṃkam ante ▁sabbaṃ ▁taṃ ▁tiṇ añca ▁bhus añca ▁mukh ato ▁ ova m itvā ▁a cch assa ▁udak assa ▁anā vi l assa ▁vippa sann assa ▁yāva ▁mukh ato ▁pūr ito ▁vi ssa nd anto ▁maññ e ▁ṭhit oti

original: Pattena pānīyaṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
“acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
Ayañhi so, bhante, udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṁ taṁ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: ▁ayañhi ▁so ▁bhante ▁ud apā no ▁ma yi ▁ upasaṃkam ante ▁sabbaṃ ▁taṃ ▁tiṇ añca ▁bhus añca ▁mukh ato ▁ ova m itvā ▁a cch assa ▁udak assa ▁anā vi l assa ▁vippa sann assa ▁yāva ▁mukh ato ▁pūr ito ▁vi ssa nd anto ▁maññ e ▁aṭṭhāsi

original: Pivatu bhagavā pānīyaṁ, pivatu sugato pānīyan”ti.
Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
“Kiṁ kayirā udapānena,
Āpā ce sabbadā siyuṁ;
Taṇhāya mūlato chetvā,
Kissa pariyesanaṁ care”ti.
Navamaṁ.
